00031         public UserRightModule()
00032         {
00033                 super();
00034                 setDefaultAction(new BaseAction("GetList", new User()));
00035                 addGlobalActionMenuItem("Utilisateurs", new BaseAction("GetList",
00036                                 new User()));
00037                 addGlobalActionMenuItem("Liste des droits", new BaseAction("GetList",
00038                                 new Right()));
00039                 addGlobalActionMenuItem("Groupes", new BaseAction("GetList",
00040                                 new Groups()));
00041                 setVisibleName("Gestion de droits");
00042         }

00044         public void initDB()
00045         {
00046                 Groups groups;
00047                 User user;
00048                 Right right;
00049                 int rightID;
00050                 GroupsRight groupsRight;
00051 
00052                 // ***************** unlogged User ****************
00053                 // cree le groupe
00054                 groups = new Groups();
00055                 groups.setData("groupName", "unLogedGroup");
00056                 groups.newE();
00057 
00058                 // cree le user unLogedUser
00059                 user = new User();
00060                 user.setData("name", "unLogedUser");
00061                 user.setData("password", "");
00062                 user.setData(groups.getForeignKeyName(), groups.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00063                 user.newE();
00064 
00065                 // retrouve le rightID du login
00066                 right = new Right();
00067                 right.setData("moduleName", getSystemName());
00068                 right.setData("actionName", "Login");
00069                 right = (Right) right.get(right).get(0);
00070                 rightID = (Integer) right.getData(right.getPrimaryKeyName());
00071 
00072                 // cree le GroupsRight pour donne acces au login a unloggedUser
00073                 groupsRight = new GroupsRight();
00074                 groupsRight.setData(groups.getForeignKeyName(),
00075                                 groups.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00076                 groupsRight.setData(right.getPrimaryKeyName(), rightID);
00077                 groupsRight.newE();
00078 
00079                 // ***************** admin User ****************
00080 
00081                 // cree le groupe
00082                 groups = new Groups();
00083                 groups.setData("groupName", "admin");
00084                 groups.newE();
00085 
00086                 // cree le user Admin
00087                 user = new User();
00088                 user.setData("name",
00089                                 ConfigManager.loadStringAttrProperty("default-user", "name"));
00090                 user.setData("password", ConfigManager.loadStringAttrProperty(
00091                                 "default-user", "password"));
00092                 user.setData(groups.getPrimaryKeyName(), groups.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00093                 user.newE();
00094 
00095                 groupsRight = new GroupsRight();
00096 
00097                 // retrouve les rightID pour donne les droit au group admin
00098                 right = new Right();
00099                 right.setData("moduleName", getSystemName());
00100                 for (AbstractOrmEntity currentRight : Orm.select(right))
00101                 {
00102                         rightID = currentRight.getPrimaryKeyValue();
00103 
00104                         // cree le GroupsRight
00105                         groupsRight.setData("groupsID", groups.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00106                         groupsRight.setData("rightID", rightID);
00107                         groupsRight.newE();
00108                 }
00109         }
00110 
00116         public void addGroupsRight(String groupName, String actionName,
00117                         String entityName)
00118         {
00119                 // todo: correct deprecate
00120                 Groups groups = (Groups) Orm.getOrCreateEntity(new Groups(),
00121                                 "groupName", groupName);
00122                 // todo: correct deprecate
00123                 Right right = (Right) Orm.getOrCreateEntity(new Right(), "actionName",
00124                                 actionName, "entityName", entityName);
00125 
00126                 // todo: correct deprecate
00127                 Orm.getOrCreateEntity(new GroupsRight(), groups.getForeignKeyName(),
00128                                 groups.getPrimaryKeyValue().toString(), right
00129                                                 .getForeignKeyName(), right.getPrimaryKeyValue()
00130                                                 .toString());
00131         }
00132

00138

00141                 Groups groups = (Groups) Orm.getOrCreateEntity(new Groups(),
00142                                 "groupName", groupName);
00143                 // todo: correct deprecate
00144                 Right right = (Right) Orm.getOrCreateEntity(new Right(), "actionName",
00145                                 rightActionName);
00146 
00147                 // todo: correct deprecate
00148                 Orm.getOrCreateEntity(new GroupsRight(), groups.getForeignKeyName(),
00149                                 groups.getPrimaryKeyValue().toString(), right
00150                                                 .getForeignKeyName(), right.getPrimaryKeyValue()
00151                                                 .toString());

00158         public void removeGroupsRight(String groupName, String rightActionName)
00159 
00160         {
00161                 // todo: correct deprecate
00162                 Groups groups = (Groups) Orm.getOrCreateEntity(new Groups(),
00163                                 "groupName", groupName);
00164                 // todo: correct deprecate
00165                 Right right = (Right) Orm.getOrCreateEntity(new Right(), "actionName",
00166                                 rightActionName);
00167 
00168                 // todo: correct deprecate
00169                 Orm.delete(new GroupsRight(), groups.getForeignKeyName(), groups
00170                                 .getPrimaryKeyValue().toString(), right.getForeignKeyName(),
00171                                 right.getPrimaryKeyValue().toString());
00172         }

00178         public boolean isPermissionAllowed(ActionLink actionLink)
00179         {
00180                 String userName = Authentication.getCurrentUserName();
00181                 Groups groups = tryGetGroupsForUser(userName);
00182                 String entityName;
00183                 AbstractEntity entity;
00184 
00185                 if (groups == null)
00186                         return false;
00187 
00188                 AbstractAction action = actionLink.getAction();
00189                 String actionName = action.getSystemName();
00190 
00191                 if (action instanceof BaseAction)
00192                         entity = ((BaseAction) action).getEntity();
00193                 else
00194                         entity = action.getEntityUsable();
00195 
00196                 if (entity == null)
00197                         entityName = "";
00198                 else
00199                         entityName = entity.getSystemName();
00200 
00201                 Right right = tryGetRight(actionName, entityName);
00202 
00203                 if (right == null)
00204                         right = tryGetRight(actionName);
00205 
00206                 return isGroupsRightExists(groups.getPrimaryKeyValue(),
00207                                 right.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00208         }
00209 
00210         private Right tryGetRight(String actionName)
00211         {
00212                 Right right = new Right();
00213                 right.setData("actionName", actionName);
00214 
00215                 Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> rightList = right.get();
00216                 if (rightList.size() > 0)
00217                         return (Right) rightList.get(0);
00218                 return null;
00219         }
00220 
00221         private Right tryGetRight(String actionName, String entityName)
00222 
00223         {
00224                 Right right = new Right();
00225                 right.setData("actionName", actionName);
00226                 right.setData("entityName", entityName);
00227 
00228                 Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> rightList = right.get();
00229                 if (rightList.size() > 0)
00230                         return (Right) rightList.get(0);
00231                 return null;
00232         }
00233 
00234         private Groups tryGetGroupsForUser(String userName)
00235         {
00236                 User user = new User();
00237                 user.setData("name", userName);
00238 
00239                 Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> userList = user.get();
00240 
00241                 if (userList.size() < 1)
00242                         return null;
00243 
00244                 user = (User) userList.get(0);
00245 
00246                 Groups groups = (Groups) AccessorManager.getSingleAccessor(user,
00247                                 "groupsID");
00248 
00249                 return groups;
00250         }
00251 
00252         private boolean isGroupsRightExists(Integer groupsID, Integer rightID)
00253 
00254         {
00255                 GroupsRight groupsRight = new GroupsRight();
00256                 groupsRight.setData("groupsID", groupsID);
00257                 groupsRight.setData("rightID", rightID);
00258 
00259                 Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> entityList = groupsRight.get();
00260                 return entityList.size() > 0;
00261         }
